main.name: Ryan Hu
main.occupation: Toronto based first-year engineering student at the University of Waterloo.
main.bio: I'm an 1B Managment Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I am an avid hacker and I always enjoy learning new technologies to improve my skillset. I am still seeking my first co-op for the term of Summer 2021. Apart from programming, I am an avid car enthusiast, ski instructor and Raptors fan. Feel free to get in touch with me!

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Java Programming | Electrical Ciruits | Excel manipulation & VBA Programming

work.title: Hack the North
work.description: Designed AI web app cooking assisant to give recipes from a picture of ingredients in fridge using Tensorflow Res-Net model and REST API's. Developed web app that retrieves company stock info using IBM Watson and IBM cloud

work.title: Fuse Society
work.description: Organized multiple initiatives for 10 000+ youth nationally in Vancouver and Canada. Secured $6000+ in sponsorships and raised $10 000 book donations across the community

projects.title: RecipeGO
projects.category: AI cooking assistant that gives recipes from ingredients inside a picture of a fridge

projects.category: Web-app that retrieves company stock information with a photo using deep learning

testimonials.text: Ryan has been a hardworking, dedicated and passionate employee at my tutor company in the last 3 years he has worked as a robotics teacher.
